posts.post_content:
Guys. You have to PAY for the thing even if you search for it, it's not free.  
  
As for the cost, a 9/5 trampler for 7 would be good with nothing else, but the library search takes the cake. Get a [Sylvan Ranger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sylvan Ranger) or a [Cultivate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cultivate) later in the game? Drop it and play this dude. Pretty much no downside, as it survives all burn up to and including [Flame Slash](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flame Slash).
posts.html:
Guys. You have to PAY for the thing even if you search for it, it's not free.

As for the cost, a 9/5 trampler for 7 would be good with nothing else, but the library search takes the cake. Get a Sylvan Ranger or a Cultivate later in the game? Drop it and play this dude. Pretty much no downside, as it survives all burn up to and including Flame Slash.

posts.post_content:
(WotC Employee 1): Hey! Does anyone have an idea to make [Demonic Tutor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Demonic Tutor) possibly better and cheaper?  
(WotC Employee 2): How about create a creature that can be cast if you're looking through your library?  
(WotC Employee 1): Genius Derek! Let's do it! It'd make so much sense!  
(WotC Employee 3): Yeah! And then we'll make a creature WITH Demonic Tutor on it, and make it a flying demon!  
(1):...  
(2): That's F\*\*king stupid, you idiot. What kind of genius would make that?  
(1): Yeah, Jim. Go away. No one wants you here. Ok, so now, lets give it... Trample!... And make it... a Wurm! Yeah!  
  
And that's how [Rune-Scarred Demon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rune-Scarred Demon) was created.  
Wait, what? Hmm?

Posted By: DoragonShinzui (5/24/2012 8:40:25 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: If I had a dollar for every shocked look I've gotten while playing this... The reason he is so great is that he has the power to end games when you do play him, and he comes out of absolutely nowhere. With an [evolving wilds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=evolving wilds) out you can play this any time, with an empty hand. That is *very* useful when you are facing a control deck. Wait for a tap-out and suddenly BAM a big stompy 9/5 appears!
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
Adds "cantrip" to land searches. And by "cantrip" I mean "OH GOD WHERE DID THAT THING COME FROM AHHHHHH"  
  
The best thing about this is that it does cool stuff just by being in your library. If you just run one then you have a lower risk of drawing him and just as much chance to cast.  
  
Also: [Wheel of Sun and Moon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wheel of Sun and Moon)
